ne19:2.2_0: Yathā āvaṭṭe hāre bahukāni padaṭṭhānāni otarantīti.
ne19:2.3_0: Tattha samāropanā catubbidhā padaṭṭhānaṁ, vevacanaṁ, bhāvanā, pahānamiti.
ne19:5.5_0: tattha yaṁ kāyikañca vācasikañca sucaritaṁ, ayaṁ sīlakkhandho.
ne19:5.6_0: Manosucarite yā anabhijjhā abyāpādo ca, ayaṁ samādhikkhandho.
ne19:5.8_1: tattha sīlakkhandho ca samādhikkhandho ca samatho, paññākkhandho vipassanā.
ne19:6.4_0: Vanaṁ nāma pañca kāmaguṇā, taṇhā vanatho.
ne19:6.7_0: Vanatho nāma tesaṁ tesaṁ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṁ anubyañjanaggāho “aho cakkhu, aho sotaṁ, aho ghānaṁ, aho jivhā, aho kāyo” iti.
ne19:6.9_0: Vanaṁ nāma cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni apariññātāni.
ne19:6.10_0: Yaṁ tadubhayaṁ paṭicca uppajjati saṁyojanaṁ, ayaṁ vanatho.
ne19:7.11_0: Paññindriyaṁ, paññābalaṁ, adhipaññāsikkhā, paññākkhandho, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo, ñāṇaṁ, sammādiṭṭhi, tīraṇā, santīraṇā, hirī, vipassanā, dhamme ñāṇaṁ, sabbaṁ, idaṁ vevacanaṁ.
ne19:8.2_0: Yathāha bhagavā “tasmātiha tvaṁ bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi,
ne19:8.2_1: ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ”.
ne19:8.7_0: Evaṁ kāye kāyānupassino viharato cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
ne19:8.10_0: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
ne19:8.11_0: Catūsu sammappadhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro iddhipādā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
ne19:8.12_0: Catūsu iddhipādesu bhāviyamānesu pañcindriyāni bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
ne19:8.15_0: Sabbe hi bodhaṅgamā dhammā bodhipakkhiyā niyyānikalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇā,
ne19:9.2_0: Kāye kāyānupassī viharanto “asubhe subhan”ti vipallāsaṁ pajahati,
ne19:9.2_5: kāmāsavena ca anāsavo bhavati, kāmoghañca uttiṇṇo bhavati,
ne19:9.2_8: rūpadhātuyaṁ cassa rāgo pahīno bhavati, na ca chandāgatiṁ gacchati.
ne19:10.1_0: Vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto “dukkhe sukhan”ti vipallāsaṁ pajahati,
ne19:10.1_5: bhavāsavena ca anāsavo bhavati, bhavoghañca uttiṇṇo bhavati,
ne19:10.1_8: vedanādhātuyaṁ cassa rāgo pahīno bhavati, na ca dosāgatiṁ gacchati.
ne19:11.1_0: Citte cittānupassī viharanto “anicce niccan”ti vipallāsaṁ pajahati,
ne19:11.1_9: saññādhātuyaṁ cassa rāgo pahīno bhavati, na ca bhayāgatiṁ gacchati.
ne19:12.1_0: Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharanto “anattani attā”ti vipallāsaṁ pajahati,
ne19:12.1_9: saṅkhāradhātuyaṁ cassa rāgo pahīno bhavati, na ca mohāgatiṁ gacchati.
